newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $2.1 bln for week of May 27.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $2.1 bln for week of May 27.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for the week of May 27 are expected to total $2.1 billion in 77 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $989 million in 32 sales, with a $150 million California deal through J.P. Morgan Securities Inc. topping the list.
On the competitive side, 45 sales totaling $1.1 billion are on the schedule. A $256 million Los Angeles County Metropolitan Transportation Authority issue on Thursday is the largest.
An additional 10 sales totaling $427 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the issues next week depending on market conditions.
